ygData.subject: Re: specialize
ygData.msgSnippet: well, at level 20 you should put one training (at least, to get started) into each of them. **what you have to be careful of is when you are approaching 50
ygData.messageBody:
well, at level 20 you should put one training (at least, to get started)
into each of them.

**what you have to be careful of is when you are approaching 50 skill points
in any one specialize. the first one OVER fifty points will be your primary
specialization, and can progress over 50 pts. the others will be capped at
50.

i chose alteration as my specialty, since the majority of necro spells are
alteration.

belphenor



>From: wolfie <lachdanan@...>
>
>I'd like some feedback on what you chose to specialize in and why?
>
>Smakin L20 Necro - Povar
